name: Andor: Wrecking Dawn
storyline: Bring your creativity and enthusiasm and quickly enter Andor's fantasy world! Whether you are a Paladin with a bright deck or a Necromancer with an evil deck, you will compete with players from all over the world on the arena. As long as you are passionate about strategy and tactics, Andor will surely bring you an experience you have never had before.
summary: Andor: Wrecking Dawn is a cross-platform multi-player online card game (CCG). The game has five factions and about 500 magic cards to choose from, filled with infinite possibilities of deep strategy combinations. Players can build their decks with their own preferences to compete with others.
